explain: Orlando City from MLS express interest in Manchester United's Javier Hernandez, possibly as an option to replace his current tough season on loan at Real Madrid.

Javier Hernandez, a talented football player who has struggled at Real Madrid this season, has drawn interest from Orlando City, who have a significant Latin-American fanbase. They are among the clubs showing interest along with Southampton, Stoke, West Ham, and Everton. Hernandez would be a popular addition to these teams and could enhance their fan base with his skills and on-field performance.

Manchester United made a new contract offer to teenager Andreas Pereira, as they are interested in keeping the talented player. There is also strong interest from other top European clubs like Paris St. Germain, Juventus, PSV Eindhoven, and Feyenoord for Pereira's services.
